ExtensionDescription.message:
Do More with Tabs is a small WebExtension that adds some helpful features for manipulating tabs.

From a tab's context menu, DMT can create a new tab next to the tab, duplicate the tab, move the tab to the start or end of its window, and split and merge windows.

DMT also adds two keyboard shortcuts. To create a new tab next to the current tab, use Alt+T, or Ctrl+T if you are on a Mac. To duplicate the current tab, use Alt+Shift+T, or Ctrl+Shift+T if you are on a Mac.

As a WebExtension, DMT will continue to work in Firefox 57 and beyond. To function correctly, it requires at least Firefox 53.
